abstract: While it’s still unclear how Yahoo shareholders will react to management’s decision to spurn Microsoft‘s sweetened $33 per-share bid, Alibaba.com shareholders have already made their feelings clear.
lead_paragraph: While it’s still unclear how Yahoo shareholders will react to management’s decision to spurn Microsoft‘s sweetened $33 per-share bid, Alibaba.com shareholders have already made their feelings clear.

headline.main: Alibaba Takes A Dive After Microsoft Pulls Yahoo Bid
